attributes.action: make Downing Street a public right of way and get rid of the gates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think it is a disgrace the way the Prime Minsiter locks himself away in Downing Street and blocks off access to the public the people who put him there. The Prime Minister, is not so important that he needs a whole street to himself with police stopping people even walking down there. I don't expect to be able to drive down it but we pedestrians and cyclists should be given unrestiricted access, like they have in my street.

It's our street, if we want to walk down then we should be able to.

rejection.details: Rejected as it makes no point relating to Government policy
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
